channel.title: Developers needed[delta]
channel.description:
I need developers for making a custom delta server from scratch.
I would like the following features to be added; full Godsword specials at least 10 quests. fully functional pkpoint system fully functionall highscores system fully functional clan wars fully functional minigames fully functional donate and vote systems all godwars bosses full corporeal boss all skills working
the positions needed are: 1 server coders 1 client coder 1 web designer 1 financer 1 hoster and any other positions can be suggested.
if you would like a position contact me on Skype at Nessie.rsps1 no capitals please no video or voice calls.
my experience in coding is 3-4 years of java and 1-2 years of html/php and I'm 13 I'm not the greatest coder hence why I am asking for a team I can code skills and items in
[b]application format[/b] 1) experience in java
2) experience in web design or development
3) age
4) position you would like
5) Skype?
6 can you give financial help?
thanks, nessie

item.title: Developers needed[delta]
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Try to reword this, to make it more professional-looking.
For example, state your experience working with Java, what part of the project you will be working on, and if you plan to host.
Maybe you can use an application format, and make a different one for each position.

Read full topic
